pages.text: After priming on $(l:conjuring:basics/basic_gem_tinkering)Basic Gem Tinkering$(), one might realize the $(item)Gem Tinkerer$()'s $(o)full potential$(). Upon acquiring some $(item)Soul Alloy Tools$(), it can infuse them with $(l:conjuring:basics/basic_gem_tinkering)Aspect Gems$(). This procedure is remarkably similar to normal operation, as one must simply substitute the $(item)Lesser Conjuration Essence$() with the tool and the items on the columns with the desired gems. There is a limit to this power however.

pages.title: 調整寶石
pages.text: 一個工具只能攜帶兩種寶石類型，並且不能超過 5 顆寶石。
